game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the Lost City of Eldarath
game.description: Rumors have surfaced about a long-abandoned city deep within the nearby forest, said to contain powerful relics. Brave adventurers are sought to explore the ruins and retrieve an ancient artifact.
game.reward: 1000 Gold Pieces, +2 Sword of Light, Increased Reputation with the Guild

task.objective: Gather information about the Lost City from local villagers
task.description: Talk to the villagers in nearby Oakwood Village and gather any information they may have about the Lost City.

task.objective: Navigate through the treacherous forest terrain to reach the Lost City
task.description: Brave the dangers of the forest and make your way to the Lost City. Be cautious of roaming beasts and hidden pitfalls.

task.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the heart of the Lost City
task.description: Explore the ruins and navigate deadly traps to reach the central chamber. Claim the ancient artifact and prepare for your journey back.
task.location: Lost City of Eldarath, Central Chamber
